release_note: Introducing Monthly Reviews! This new feature allows you to explore your past month s journey reflecting on key moments accomplishments and learning opportunities. Clearful uses your journal entries from the month and intelligently creates a beautiful editorial style overview with stats graphics round ups a word cloud and AI powered summaries. Additionally you can now open and complete a Discover Daily journal prompt that was accidentally skipped. Simply tap on the Discover Daily card in the Today tab. Thank you to those of you who shared your feedback about this issue! This release also includes various bug fixes and performance design and security improvements. We re committed to enhancing your journaling experience and would love your support. If you enjoy this update please consider leaving a 5 star rating to help us continue improving Clearful. Thank you for using Clearful and for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Warmly Team Clearful

This release introduces a way for you to provide feedback on your Weekly Monthly Reviews. It also includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for using Clearful and for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions.

This release includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions.

Introducing Weekly Monthly Reviews! As we embark on the New Year embrace an insightful way to engage with your life s journey. Our latest feature Weekly Monthly Reviews is here to transform how you reflect and grow. Reflecting on your life allows you to cherish the beautiful moments of your days. It also gives you insight into what isn t working and enables you to take steps to change your path in life. Clearful intelligently takes journal entries from the past week or month and creates a beautiful editorial style overview highlighting progress joyous moments and opportunities for growth with: aggregated stats delightful visuals graphics AI powered summaries insights This release also includes various bug fixes and performance design and security improvements. We re committed to enhancing your journaling experience and would love your support. If you enjoy this update please consider leaving a 5 star rating to help us continue improving Clearful. Your feedback and support fuel our improvements and we re always here to listen. Reach out to us at hello clearful.com mailto:hello clearful.com for any questions comments or suggestions you might have. Happy New Year! Team Clearful

Introducing Journaling Suggestions 2.0! With this release we ve added beautiful maps full screen views of the moments and design improvements to the new feature. This feature seamlessly integrates with Apple s on device intelligence offering you personalized suggestions to enrich your journaling experience. Now you can effortlessly add moments from your daily life to your journal entries in Clearful! Apple creates journaling suggestions based on your everyday moments such as: Place you visited Person you connected with Photo from your library Video from your library Song you played Podcast you listened to Workout you completed Motion activity you did e.g. a walk Your privacy is paramount and built into this feature. Clearful only accesses data you ve given Apple permission to share ensuring your personal moments stay personal. This release also includes various bug fixes and performance design and security improvements. We re committed to enhancing your journaling experience and would love your support. If you enjoy this update please consider leaving a 5 star rating to help us continue improving Clearful. Your feedback and support fuel our improvements and we re always here to listen. Reach out to us at hello clearful.com for any questions comments or suggestions you might have. Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers This release includes: 1. International launch in 175 regions! 2. Home widgets now match your Clearful theme. 3. New toolbar design in journal entries. 4. Add photos directly from the camera. 5. Quick actions from your home screen. International Launch Clearful has launched worldwide! The app is now available in 175 countries or regions across the globe. Our mission is to bring a delightful journaling experience to individuals from all backgrounds and nations. Clearful is a place where all individuals can freely express their thoughts feelings experiences and ideas in a private and calm place. Themed Home Widgets Your home screen widgets now match the app theme you have set in Clearful for a more personalized experience. To change your theme in the app go to Settings Appearance Theme. New Toolbar Design The toolbar has a new look! We ve redesigned the toolbar and the other buttons on the entry screen to create a more clean and calm canvas for your journaling. Add Photos Directly From the Camera You can now directly open the Camera app from a journal entry to add a photo. When you tap click on the photo icon you will see two options: Camera and Photos. This enables you to take a picture and add it to your entry while you re journaling! Home Screen Quick Actions You can now perform quick actions on the Home Screen and the App Library. Touch and hold the Clearful app icon to open the quick actions menu. You can choose to give feedback create a new entry or search your journal entries. This release also includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue improving the app! Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers Today s release introduces: 1. Links in Flow Editor 2. Checkboxes in Flow Editor 3. Back to Work Collection 4. Back to School Collection With Links you can embed hyperlinks within any text block in Flow Editor enriching your journal entries with direct access to web pages. When in view mode and the keyboard is down simply tap on a link to open the webpage in Safari. With Checkboxes you can add interactive checkable items next to tasks or goals in your journal making it easier to track your progress. For example in a Bucket List journal template you can use checkboxes next to life goals or experiences giving you a way to mark off achievements as you complete them. Similarly in bullet journaling checkboxes can be used for daily tasks habit tracking or long term goals offering a snapshot of your accomplishments. The Back to Work journaling collection will help you to set goals reflect on your career and achieve a better work life balance. The Back to School journaling collection will help you to thrive this school year with guided journals. Reflect set goals and track your progress to boost your academic growth. This release also includes the usual bug fixes and performance design and security improvements. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue improving the app! Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers Today s release introduces Clearful widgets! Elevate your journaling experience with useful and delightful Apple Widgets that bring timely information and your favorite features right to your iPhone and iPad home screen. New Widgets: 1 Discover Daily Prompt Get inspired to journal and reflect on something new every day with a thought provoking Discover Daily journal prompt. Answer first thing in the morning or take a glance and ponder throughout the day. 2 Rediscover Revisit journal entries from various time periods to relive fond memories recognize patterns in your life and see how far you ve come. 3 Progress Streaks Track your writing progress for the past seven days and stay motivated yet flexible with daily and weekly journaling streaks. 4 Essential Quick Actions Shortcuts Quickly access each day s most important actions such as writing a new entry answering the Discover Daily journal prompt and checking your Rediscover entries. 5 Ultimate Quick Actions Shortcuts Quickly access each day s essential actions as well as additional actions and shortcuts in the app for the ultimate power user experience. 6 Recently Used Guided Journals Quickly access recently used prompts and templates for a streamlined daily journaling routine. Today s release also includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! Hey Clearful Journalers Today s release includes: 1. Pinned journal entries bring faster access to important and in progress entries. 2. Delayed biometric authentication allows you to leave and come back to the app without it locking immediately. 3. Entry long press reveals an action sheet without having to open an entry. 4. 60 new Discover Daily journal prompts for more thought provoking thinking and writing. Pinned journal entries You can now pin journal entries to the top of the Entries list for faster access. This feature is handy if you have entries that you d like to have top of mind e.g. Yearly Review 2022 Bucket List Not To Do List . It is also a great place to keep work in progress entries you don t want to forget about. Delayed biometric authentication Don t want biometric authentication such as FaceID and TouchID to be enabled immediately after leaving the Clearful app Go to Settings and turn on Time Out After to your desired timeframe from 10 seconds to 2 minutes. This feature allows you to leave the app and come back without being prompted for re authentication within the set period of time making it easier to jump back and forth between multiple apps. Entry long press Press and hold on to a journal entry snippet in the Entries tab to reveal an action sheet that contains quick access to pinning entries adding a security lock enabling or disabling Rediscover and deleting entries. 60 new Discover Daily journal prompts Challenge your thought patterns and learn something new about yourself daily with thought provoking journal prompts in the Today tab. Here s a sneak preview of upcoming prompts: In what ways do I feel rich In what ways do I feel poor What different roles do I play in my life E.g. spouse parent gardener cook How can I encourage myself when trying something new If I were to focus more on being patient today how would I make that happen What rule do I think needs to be broken Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com mailto:hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers After releasing our latest version we found a small bug that we decided to squash. This update fixes the bug and contains all the goodies from the last release listed below: 1. Pinned journal entries bring faster access to important and in progress entries. 2. Delayed biometric authentication allows you to leave and come back to the app without it locking immediately. 3. Entry long press reveals an action sheet without having to open an entry. 4. 60 new Discover Daily journal prompts for more thought provoking thinking and writing. Pinned journal entries You can now pin journal entries to the top of the Entries list for faster access. This feature is handy if you have entries that you d like to have top of mind e.g. Yearly Review 2022 Bucket List Not To Do List . It is also a great place to keep work in progress entries you don t want to forget about. Delayed biometric authentication Don t want biometric authentication such as FaceID and TouchID to be enabled immediately after leaving the Clearful app Go to Settings and turn on Time Out After to your desired timeframe from 10 seconds to 10 minutes. This feature allows you to leave the app and come back without being prompted for re authentication within the set period of time making it easier to jump back and forth between multiple apps. Entry long press Press and hold on to a journal entry snippet in the Entries tab to reveal an action sheet that contains quick access to pinning entries adding a security lock enabling or disabling Rediscover and deleting entries. 60 new Discover Daily journal prompts Challenge your thought patterns and learn something new about yourself daily with thought provoking journal prompts in the Today tab. Here s a sneak preview of upcoming prompts: In what ways do I feel rich In what ways do I feel poor What different roles do I play in my life E.g. spouse parent gardener cook How can I encourage myself when trying something new If I were to focus more on being patient today how would I make that happen What rule do I think needs to be broken Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com mailto:hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers Today s release includes: 1. 6 New Guided Journaling Templates. 2. Rediscover improvements that allow you to see if you ve completed the day s review or where you are in the process. 5 New Guided Journaling Templates We ve added six new templates to the Guided Journaling Library. Three are available to everyone while another three are available to Clearful Pro members. Movie Review Evening Pages Positive Experiences: Level 1 Positive Experiences: Level 2 Pro Positive Experiences: Level 3 Pro How Emotion Affects My Life Pro Rediscover Improvements The Rediscover card in the Today tab will now change according to where you are in the review process. If you have entries remaining to review it will show you how many and bring you back to where you left off. If you have completed the day s review it will display a completed state. You will now have more clarity of your daily Rediscover progress to ensure you don t miss out on looking back at your past self! Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Here s a preview of a few of the upcoming questions: What are some things I would like to stay as they are now What is something fulfilling for me at the moment If I had an extra hour every morning what would I do with that time Who is someone that has positively influenced me and how To ensure you don t miss a new Discover Daily prompt go to Settings Reminders Notifications then turn on the Discover Daily notification. Hey Clearful Journalers Meet Clearful Pro! With our new optional plan you can unlock more powerful journaling features and support our independent team. 1. See progress with insights analytics and charts. 2. Unlock all Pro guided journaling templates. 3. Create custom collections in the Library. 4. Personalize your journal with beautiful themes. 5. Lock sensitive entries for an extra layer of security. 6. Uncover patterns with template use history. 7. Get priority email support from our team. 8. Support continued development of the product. 9. And much more to come! Tap on the Search icon in the top right corner of the Entries screen then enter what you re looking for and entries will begin to appear. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers Today s release includes: 1. Journal entries export as plain text. 2. Several bug fixes and performance improvements. Export Journal Entries While striving to provide a delightful journaling experience in Clearful we also strongly believe that your journal data is yours to use how and where you want. So you can now export all of your journal entries as a plain text document. You will have more export options down the road as well. To export your entries go to Settings Account Info Export Journal Entries. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful Journalers With today s release you can: 1. Search the Guided Journaling Library. 2. Curate your Want to Do and Favorites Collections with Templates and Prompts. 3. Journal with 4 new Prompts and 2 new Templates. Library Search We ve heard your feedback that finding specific Templates and Prompts can be difficult. Now instead of browsing the Library you can search for Templates and Prompts directly! Tap the Search button in the Library to quickly find resources. Collections for You You can now save Templates and Prompts to two Collections just for you: Want to Do and Favorites! Save guided journals you d like to complete someday to the Want to Do Collection for a curated list of inspiration. Save your most loved guided journals to the Favorites Collection for quick and easy access to your faves. To save open any Prompt or Template and tap the Save button. New Guided Journals A very big Thank you! to the Clearful members who suggested our newest Templates and Prompts your input is greatly appreciated! Open the New Collection in the Library to journal with these new additions. New Templates: 1. Anxiety 5 4 3 2 1 Exercise 2. Sleep Journal New Prompts: 1. What do I need to do to become a better person 2. What is one moment that I repeatedly go back to and why 3. What made me laugh today 4. What made me cry today These new features are just two of the many improvements to come in making the Library and its resources more accessible and personal for you. This release also includes the usual design improvements and bug squashing. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com mailto:hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful journalers With today s release you can: 1. View linked Templates to your journal entries. 2. Take a first look at the newest guided journals by visiting the New Collection in the Library. 3. Experience enhanced accessibility features. 4. Enjoy a more beautiful clean and consistent design of various elements throughout the app. Linked Templates You can now see if you created your journal entries from Templates and which ones. Open a journal entry tap on the three dot icon to open the Entry Info Sheet and view your linked Templates. New Collection in Library Discover the latest journaling prompts and templates in the New Collection! This Collection will be updated regularly as new guided journaling resources are added to Clearful. Head on over to the Library tab and open the New Collection to see the latest. Many more guided journaling resources are coming your way! Enhanced Accessibility Elements throughout the app such as cards and buttons now have semantic labels making the app much more accessible to all Clearful journalers! Improved Design of Buttons Bottom Sheets and More Enjoy a more beautiful calm and consistent experience in your journal with interface improvements to buttons bottom sheets and many more elements. We re always working on ways to make your journaling experience more delightful! Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

Hey Clearful journalers With today s release you can quickly capture thoughts and feelings throughout the day with an easy access Quick Capture field just above the tab bar! Whether you d like to record an interesting thought an emotion you re experiencing or simply clear your mind quick capture is a great way to practice micro journaling and take a moment of reflection more often. This release also includes various design improvements and bug fixes. Thank you for your continued feedback and support! As always please out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better! Happy journaling Team Clearful

We ve added many new guided journaling resources in this release. Check out the new templates and prompts in the Library particularly the brand new Love collection just in time for Valentine s Day! We ve heard from several of you thanks for reaching out! that you d like to update your account s email address so you can now do so in Settings Account Info. The usual bug fixes and design updates have also made their way into this release. As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better!

We ve heard great things from many of you about our Guided Journaling Library of templates prompts and collections. Today we re expanding these resources so whenever you need an idea or inspiration it s only a tap away! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better!

iPad owners you re going to love this update! We ve worked hard to make journaling with Clearful beautiful on every screen. If you re using your iPad with a Magic or Smart Keyboard or in landscape mode you ll enjoy a full width journaling experience that helps you journal faster and more often. We ve also tidied things up and fixed a few sneaky bugs. As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. If you like this update please consider supporting Clearful by leaving a 5 star rating so we can continue making the app better!

Today s update is about helping you more easily do your New Year and Holiday journaling. Our last update introduced Collections themed guided journaling resources curated by our team. You can now quickly select a shortlisted Prompt or Template from one of our collections New Year Holidays Editor s Picks and Popular at the bottom of your entries. This makes it easier to find inspiration when journaling. We ve also improved the design in several areas and fixed a few pesky bugs. As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful and happy New Year!

Today s update is all about the New Year! We ve released Collections themed guided journaling resources curated by our team. Explore the New Year s Collection to reflect on 2020 and plan for 2021. Record the good and the bad what went well and what could be improved and end this challenging year on a positive forward looking note. Other new Collections include Holidays Editor s Picks Recently Used and Popular. Check out the Library to view Collections and for new Collections added regularly! As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful!

We re excited to share today s update which includes several improvements and quality of life updates. 1. Recently Used Templates and Prompts Our last release laid the groundwork for making the Library s resources more accessible. Starting today your three most recently used Templates and Prompts will be available for quick use directly in every entry by tapping on Guided Journals. 2. Skip Discover Daily Improved Design You can now see the Discover Daily question directly in Today without having to open it first and skip it if it doesn t appeal to you that day. The Daily itself has also been redesigned. 3. Redesigned Rediscover Entries Rediscover has been redesigned to look and function just like your Entries vertically scrollable rather than horizontally and in day groups. It s now easier to see and open all Rediscover entries for a particular time period. Also included in this release: Clearer and more descriptive copy throughout the app. Several design updates and bug fixes. As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful!

We have three major improvements that we re excited to share with you: 1. Easy access to Guided Journaling resources in your entries Quickly browse and select shortlisted Templates and Prompts curated by our editors and the day s Discover Daily directly from your entry. This is the first step in making the Library s resources more accessible. 2. Daily and Weekly streaks We ve found streaks to be highly motivating but not everyone wants to journal every day. This is why Clearful also tracks a weekly streak that encourages consistent journaling that isn t necessarily on a daily basis. 3. Home becomes Today Now your home base in Clearful is Today. See today s entries and words written your Streaks progress Rediscover entries from the past and the Discover Daily. More exciting things to come in Today in the near future! Also included in this release: Your daily reminders now update automatically to your current timezone. Thanks daylight savings time! Removing a Rediscover entry now updates immediately in Today. Several design updates and bug fixes. As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful!

Just in time for Halloween...Dark Mode! Clearful now supports Dark Light and System Themes so you ll always get the best Clearful experience when writing or reading your journal entries. No more blinding white screen at night : Also included in this release: Secure blocking mode that covers the content of Clearful when viewing your open apps in multitasking mode See all the latest product updates directly in the app in What s New Several design updates and bug fixes As always please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful!

Introducing biometric authentication! You can now use FaceID or TouchID to securely access your journal when you re already logged in and the app is in the background. We ve also fixed several bugs and made sure things are running smoothly. Please reach out to us at hello clearful.com with any questions comments or suggestions. Thanks for using Clearful!

Thanks for using Clearful! This update includes a new way to send feedback just tap the comment icon at the top right of the screen. We ve also rebuilt Discover Daily to support multiple timezones made design improvements and fixed a few bugs. If you have questions comments or feedback please don t hesitate to reach out to us at hello clearful.com. We re happy to help!
